column5: Took few good friends and my kids out today to take advantage of the nice weather. Took us a while to find them...started with few nice silver kings and followed up with bunch of bows later on. Spoons(watermelon NK Mag, Monkey Puke Mag, Michael Jackson) and flies (green, blue and white) all worked...200-300 fow, 55'-65' down. 2.5-2.7 mph at the ball. Ended up 12/15 with last two lost fish been the biggest...last one broke my 50 lbs fluoro line between the treble and single hook on the A-Tom-Mik fly.  Few shots from the day:           Cheers, Ice Fisherman
That's quite the day you had!,sure kept the kids busy I guess. Awesome!!
Nice Emil.  I guess buddy was the rod holder,and if it got hit,it was his? LOL
Nice stuff Emil, looks like a really nice day out there
